definition: any of various deciduous pinnate-leaved ornamental or timber trees of the genus Fraxinus, to convert into ashes
details:
noun
- any of various deciduous pinnate-leaved ornamental or timber trees of the genus Fraxinus
= synonyms: ash tree
- strong elastic wood of any of various ash trees
- the residue that remains when something is burned
verb
- to convert into ashes
= example: to convert into ashes
